description: '''Rainer Ptacek''', also known mononymously as '''Rainer''' (June 7, 1951 â€“ November 12, 1997), was a [[German-American]] guitarist and singer-songwriter based in [[Tucson, Arizona]] for much of his adult life. His guitar technique, which incorporated [[Slide guitar|slide]], [[finger-picking]], [[tape loop]]s and electronic manipulation, earned him the admiration of notable musicians such as [[Robert Plant]] and [[Billy Gibbons]].
